text:
"Iya,"
"[redacted_name], sebenarnya kamu kemana?"
Jauh dari lubuk hatinya, [redacted_name] ternyata juga merindukan sosok [redacted_name] di sampingnya, meskipun ia tidak tahu perasaan seperti apa yang ada pada dirinya terhadap [redacted_name].
.....................
[redacted_name] mengusap wajahnya kasar. Sang Ayah tiba-tiba berubah pikiran, [redacted_name] adalah sosok keras yang tak bisa dilawan jika ia sudah memutuskan sesuatu. Awalnya [redacted_name] senang karena sang Ayah menyetujui hal tentang hubungannya dengan [redacted_name], tetapi setelah mendengar kabar bahwa sang pewaris keluarga [redacted_name] sakit-sakitan, [redacted_name] khawatir jika suatu hati nanti [redacted_name] malah tidak mendapatkan warisan apa pun dari keluarga [redacted_name].
"Apa hanya uang yang bisa ayah pikirkan?" tanya [redacted_name].
"Ya, tentu saja, semua ini ayah lakukan demi kamu dan keluarga kita,"jawab [redacted_name] sambil menyesap batang rokok yang mengapit dikedua jarinya.
"Lebih baik kamu tinggalkan saja pria itu, masih banyak pria lain yang lebih mampu membuatmu bahagia."
"Nggak, [redacted_name] akan tetap bersama Tuan muda,"tegasnya.
[redacted_name] terkekeh pelan,"Bodoh, memang apa bagusnya menikah dengan Tuan mudamu itu."
trans:
"Yes,"
"[redacted_name], actually, where are you going?"
Deep down, [redacted_name] also misses [redacted_name] beside her, even though she doesn't know what kind of feeling she has towards [redacted_name].
........................
[redacted_name] rubs her face roughly. The father suddenly changes his mind, [redacted_name] is a stubborn person who is hard to resist when he already decided on something. At first [redacted_name] was happy because his dad has approved her relationship with [redacted_name], but after hearing the news that the heir of [redacted_name] is sickly, [redacted_name] worries that someday [redacted_name] will not even get any inheritance from [redacted_name]'s family.
"Do you only think about money Dad?" asked [redacted_name].
"Yes, of course, all of these I've done for you and our family," answered [redacted_name] while smoking a cigarette nestled between his two fingers.
"It is better that you leave him, there are many other guys who are more capable of making you happy."
"No, [redacted_name] will stay with the Young master," she said firmly.
[redacted_name] chuckles, "How stupid, what is so good marrying your Young master."
